sentences.sContent: In the spring all everything around the place is covered with primroses. At the moment wood anemone is abloom.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the spring all everything around the place is covered with primroses. At the moment wood anemone is abloom.
sentences.sCn: 春天来了，这里周围的一切都被樱草花淹没，而此刻银莲花正在愉快的盛放。

sentences.sContent: A big red anemone made for perfect negative space behind the two nudis, and the picture turned out to be one of my very favorites from this trip.
sentences.sContent_eng: A big red anemone made for perfect negative space behind the two nudis, and the picture turned out to be one of my very favorites from this trip.
sentences.sCn: 一个巨大的红色海葵在这两个裸体动物的后面，权充为完美实体周围的背景空间，照片画面的结果竟然是从我此行中最喜爱的一个。

trans.tranOther: a plant with red, white, or blue flowers
